<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <entry>70224</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:colos_en/140163</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:colos_en/140163</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Nihanje in sprememba energije</string>
            <string language="en">Oscillation and transformation of energy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pendelbewegung und Transformation von Energie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Oscillation et transformation d'énergie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Oscilação e transformação da energia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Oscillazione e trasformazione di energia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταλάντωση και μετασχηματισμός της ενέργειας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Oscilación y transformación de la energía</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Prikaz spremembe energije pri harmoničnem nihanju - prehod prožnostne energije v kinetično in potencialno.</string>
            <string language="en">Transformation of energy in case of harmonic motion - oscillation between elastic, kinetic and potential energy.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">harmonično nihanje</string>
            <string language="en">harmonic motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">energija nihanja</string>
            <string language="en">oscillation energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mehanika</string>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Transformation von Energie falls von der 
harmonischen Bewegung - Pendelbewegung zwischen elastische, kinetische
und mögliche Energie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transformation d'énergie en cas de mouvement 
harmonique - oscillation entre l'énergie élastique, cinétique et 
potentielle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transformação da energia caso que do movimento 
harmonic - oscilação entre a energia elástica, cinética e 
potencial.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasformazione di energia nel caso di movimento 
armonico - oscillazione fra energia elastica, cinetica e potenziale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετασχηματισμός της ενέργειας σε περίπτωση αρμονικής 
κίνησης - ταλάντωση μεταξύ της ελαστικής, κινητικής και πιθανής 
ενέργειας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transformación de la energía en caso de que del
movimiento armónico - oscilación entre la energía elástico, 
cinética y potencial.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">harmonische Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pendelbewegung Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement harmonique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie d'oscillation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mécanique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento harmonic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia da oscilação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mecânicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento armonico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia di oscillazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">meccanici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αρμονική κίνηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ενέργεια ταλάντωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μηχανικοί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">movimiento armónico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">energía de la oscilación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mecánicos</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
